readable.title: 1149179852_acad4d7300
readable.content: A man without a shirt on is guiding a large brown horse pulling a green and yellow wagon . A shirtless man escorts a horse pulling a carriage along a paved road . A shirtless man leading a horse that is pulling a carriage . Shirtless man leading a small horse-drawn covered wagon down a road The shirtless man is walking the Shetland pony and carriage down the street .
